capsules_submitted.utterance: Hagrid's affiliation with Hogwarts is a well-known fact. I mean, who wouldn't trust the gamekeeper and Care of Magical Creatures teacher? He's been an integral part of the school for years, and his loyalty to the students and staff has always been unwavering.
capsules_submitted.reply: wow! valeria, i think you might be confusing hagrid with professor mcgonagall   they're both affiliated with hogwarts, but in different capacities.

capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always had a lot of respect for Professor McGonagall. She's an amazing educator and an even more impressive witch. I'm not surprised to hear that she's affiliated with such a prestigious institution - it just makes sense that someone as talented and dedicated as McGonagall would be a part of it.
